import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset checkout (POST)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/{assetCheckoutId}/get"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



POST variant of the checkout lookup for clients that require POST semantics (for example, gateways that block GETs or when you want parity with POST-based workflows). Returns the same checkout record as the GET variant.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetCheckoutId** - Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/query/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkouts-by-query) when filtering by asset, owner, or status.

**Workflow Example**
1. Filter checkouts: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/query/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkouts-by-query) -&gt; capture `AssetCheckoutId`.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/\{assetCheckoutId\}/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkout-post) to load the checkout record.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetCheckoutId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetCheckoutId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the checkout record.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getAssetCheckoutsByQuery","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/query/get","responseField":"Items[].AssetCheckoutId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
